meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Mauritania.
meanings.sent1: In Mauritania, you can buy many things with an ougiya.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ougiyas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The ougiya in my pocket felt like a magical coin.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity was like an ougiya, spreading warmth wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The shiny ougiya gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Mauritania, equal to 5 khoums.
meanings.sent1: Five khoums make up one ougiya in Mauritania.
meanings.sent2: She received her salary in ougiyas every month.
meanings.sent3: The baker mistakenly gave me five khoums instead of an ougiya.
meanings.sent4: His words carried the weight of five khoums, each one significant.
meanings.sent5: The value of friendship cannot be measured in ougiyas alone.
